description: This Java source file is the main application class for a Spring Boot backend service. It defines the application's entry point, configures OpenAPI documentation details, and sets up CORS filtering to allow cross-origin requests, primarily for local frontend development.

classes.name: backendApplication
classes.description: Main class for launching the Spring Boot application, containing the application entry point and CORS configuration.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application, launching the Spring Boot app.

methods.name: corsFilter
methods.description: Defines and returns a CorsFilter bean that configures CORS policies for the application.
